   s   t   y   l   e       t   y   p   e   =   '   t   e   x   t   /   c   s   s   '   &gt;   #   d   p       .   a   -   c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r       a   :   n   o   t   (   [   c   l   a   s   s   ^   =   '   a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   p   r   i   c   e   '   ]   )   :   v   i   s   i   t   e   d   ,       #   d   p       .   a   -   c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r       a   :   n   o   t   (   [   c   l   a   s   s   ^   =   '   a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   p   r   i   c   e   '   ]   )   :   v   i   s   i   t   e   d   :   h   o   v   e   r       {       c   o   l   o   r   :       #   8   0   0   f   8   0       !   i   m   p   o   r   t   a   n   t   ;       }   /   s   t   y   l   e   &gt;   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   p   l   C   o   u   n   t   =   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       0   }   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

  i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   1   O   C   5   U   M   Q   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   1   O   C   5   U   M   Q   "   &gt;   S   h   a   r   e   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
                           a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   F   r   v   P   v   b   1   D   3   R   P   G   X   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   B   0   0   1   O   C   5   U   M   Q   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   F   r   v   P   v   b   1   D   3   R   P   G   X   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   U   B   K   X   V   M   I   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   1   O   C   5   U   M   Q   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   1   O   C   5   U   M   Q   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   h   a   r   e   -   e   m   a   i   l   "   &gt;                                                    a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   f   a   _   d   p   _   F   r   v   P   v   b   1   D   3   R   P   G   X   ?                    s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   s   m   a   l   l       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   p   r   i   m   a   r   y       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   c   o   n   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   c   a   r   t   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   i   n   p   u   t       i   d   =   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       C   a   r   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   h   o   v   e   r   =   "   S   e   l   e   c   t       &amp;l   t   ;   b   &amp;g   t   ;   _   _   d   i   m   s   _   _   &amp;l   t   ;   /   b   &amp;g   t   ;       f   r   o   m       t   h   e       l   e   f   t   &amp;l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;g   t   ;       t   o       a   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       C   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   p   u   t   "       t   y   p   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   "       v   a   l   u   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       C   a   r   t   "       a   r   i   a   -   l   a   b   e   l   l   e   d   b   y   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   a   n   n   o   u   n   c   e   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   a   n   n   o   u   n   c   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   t   e   x   t   "       a   r   i   a   -   h   i   d   d   e   n   =   "   t   r   u   e   "   &gt;   A   d   d       t   o       C   a   r   t   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
   
   
   
                                                   
                                                   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
                                                   
                                                   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   e   c   t   i   o   n       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   n   o   n   e       a   -   t   e   x   t   -   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;

                                   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   s   m   a   l   l       a   -   f   l   o   a   t   -   r   i   g   h   t   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   s   :   /   /   c   a   t   a   l   o   g   -   r   e   t   a   i   l   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   a   b   i   s   /   s   y   h   /   D   i   s   p   l   a   y   C   o   n   d   i   t   i   o   n   /   r   e   f   =   d   p   _   s   d   p   _   s   e   l   l   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   l   i   d   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   a   s   i   n   =   B   0   0   1   O   C   5   U   M   Q   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   d   =   A   M   Z   D   P   &amp;a   m   p   ;   s   r   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   q   i   d   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   l   i   i   d   =   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   t   e   x   t   "       r   o   l   e   =   "   b   u   t   t   o   n   "   &gt;

                   }

                                   c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t       =       M   a   t   h   .   m   i   n   (   c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t   ,       7   0   0   )   ;   
                                   
                                   v   a   r       l   a   n   d   i   n   g   I   m   a   g   e       =       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   B   y   I   d   (   "   l   a   n   d   i   n   g   I   m   a   g   e   "   )   ;   
                                   v   a   r       i   m   a   g   e   H   e   i   g   h   t       =       M   a   t   h   .   m   i   n   (   c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t   ,       6   7   9   )   ;   
                                   v   a   r       i   m   a   g   e   W   i   d   t   h       =       M   a   t   h   .   m   i   n   (   w   i   d   t   h   ,       4   8   0   )   ;   
                                   
                                   
                                   
                                   m   a   i   n   H   o   l   d   e   r   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   h   e   i   g   h   t       =       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t       +       "   p   x   "   ;   
                                   i   f   (   i   m   g   T   a   g   W   r   a   p   p   e   r   I   d       &amp;&amp;    t   y   p   e   o   f       i   m   g   T   a   g   W   r   a   p   p   e   r   I   d       !   =   =       '   u   n   d   e   f   i   n   e   d   '       )   {   
                                                   i   m   g   T   a   g   W   r   a   p   p   e   r   I   d   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   h   e   i   g   h   t       =       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t       +       "   p   x   "   ;   
                                   }   
                                   i   f   (   l   a   n   d   i   n   g   I   m   a   g   e   )   {

                                                   l   a   n   d   i   n   g   I   m   a   g   e   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   m   a   x   W   i   d   t   h           =       i   m   a   g   e   W   i   d   t   h       +       "   p   x   "   ;   
                                   }   
                                   
                                   i   f   (   s   h   o   u   l   d   A   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   )   {   
                                                   i   f   (   l   a   n   d   i   n   g   I   m   a   g   e   )   {   
                                                                   v   a   r       a   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   W   i   d   t   h   =   0   ,       a   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   H   e   i   g   h   t   =   0   ;   
                                                                   f   o   r   (   v   a   r       i   =   0   ;       i           v   i   d   e   o   S   i   z   e   s   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   ;       i   +   +   )   {   
                                                                                   i   f   (       a   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   W   i   d   t   h           v   i   d   e   o   S   i   z   e   s   [   i   ]   [   0   ]       )   {

                                                                                   }

                                                                   i   f   (       a   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   W   i   d   t   h       &gt;       0       &amp;&amp;    a   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   H   e   i   g   h   t       &gt;       0       )   {   
                                                                                   v   a   r       v   i   d   e   o   R   a   t   i   o       =       a   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   W   i   d   t   h   /   a   u   t   o   P   l   a   y   H   e   i   g   h   t   ;   
                                                                                   /   /       i   n   c   r   e   a   s   i   n   g       h   e   i   g   h   t       o   f       t   h   e       s   l   a   t   e       i   m   a   g   e       b   y       1   p   x       (   a   n   d       w   i   d   t   h       w   i   t   h       t   h   e       r   a   t   i   o   )       s   o       t   h   a   t       b   l   a   c   k       l   i   n   e   s       d   o   e   s   n   '   t       a   p   p   e   a   r       o   n       i   p   a   d       o   n       r   i   g   h   t       s   i   d   e   .   
                                                                                   v   a   r       i   s   I   p   a   d       =       n   a   v   i   g   a   t   o   r   .   u   s   e   r   A   g   e   n   t   .   m   a   t   c   h   (   /   i   p   a   d   /   i   )   ;   
                                                                                   i   f   (       i   s   I   p   a   d       )   {   
                                                                                                   c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t       =       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t       +       1   ;   
                                                                                   }   
                                                                                   l   a   n   d   i   n   g   I   m   a   g   e   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   w   i   d   t   h       =       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   e   r   H   e   i   g   h   t       *       v   i   d   e   o   R   a   t   i   o       +       "   p   x   "   ;

                   }       c   a   t   c   h       (   e   )       {   }

  i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   1   O   C   5   U   M   Q   &amp;c   h   a   n   n   e   l   =   d   e   t   a   i   l   -   g   l   a   n   c   e   &amp;n   o   d   e   I   D   =   1   6   5   7   9   6   0   1   1   &amp;s   t   o   r   e   =   b   a   b   y   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   s   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   t   a   r       a   -   s   t   a   r   -   5   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   a       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       a   -   t   e   x   t   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   b   a   s   e   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   r   e   v   i   e   w   /   R   2   D   R   Z   R   0   I   X   0   L   7   A   5   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   c   r   _   d   p   _   t   i   t   l   e   /   1   8   2   -   2   6   5   7   1   9   1   -   3   4   5   2   3   5   8   ? I       s   h   o   u   l   d       n   o   t   e       t   h   a   t       m   y       h   u   s   b   a   n   d       h   a   s       l   a   r   g   e       h   a   n   d   s       a   n   d       i   s       t   e   c   h   n   i   c   a   l   l   y       a   b   l   e       t   o       o   p   e   n       i   t       o   n   e       h   a   n   d   e   d       b   y       p   u   s   h   i   n   g       t   h   e       l   e   v   e   r       w   i   t   h       h   i   s       t   h   u   m   b       (   i   n   s   t   e   a   d       o   f       p   u   l   l   i   n   g       i   t       b   a   c   k       a   s       i   n   t   e   n   d   e   d   )       a   n   d       t   h   e   n       u   s   i   n   g       h   i   s       o   t   h   e   r       f   i   n   g   e   r   s       o   n       t   h   e       s   a   m   e       h   a   n   d       t   o       k   i   n   d       o   f       n   u   d   g   e       t   h   e       o   t   h   e   r       l   a   t   c   h       u   p       o   u   t       o   f       t   h   e       w   a   y       b   u   t       h   e       t   h   i   n   k   s       i   t   &amp;#   3   9   ;                    }   
           }   
   
   }   )   ;   
   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   /   d   i   v   &gt;

           d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   r   o   w       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   l   a   r   g   e   "   &gt;

  }   }       c   a   t   c   h   (   e   x   )       {   i   f   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   )       {   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   (   e   x   ,       {   l   o   g   L   e   v   e   l       :       '   E   R   R   O   R   '   ,   a   t   t   r   i   b   u   t   i   o   n       :       '   D   A   C   X   -   s   a   f   e   f   r   a   m   e   '   ,   m   e   s   s   a   g   e       :       '   E   r   r   o   r       a   p   p   e   n   d   i   n   g       D   A   s   f       l   i   b   r   a   r   y   '   }   )   ;   (   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   '   h   e   a   d   '   )   [   0   ]   |   |   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   '   b   o   d   y   '   )   [   0   ]   )   .   a   p   p   e   n   d   C   h   i   l   d   (   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   )   ;   }   }       c   a   t   c   h   (   e   x   )       {   i   f   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   )       {   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   (   e   x   ,       {   l   o   g   L   e   v   e   l       :       '   E   R   R   O   R   '   ,   a   t   t   r   i   b   u   t   i   o   n       :       '   D   A   C   X   -   s   a   f   e   f   r   a   m   e   '   ,   m   e   s   s   a   g   e       :       '   E   r   r   o   r       a   p   p   e   n   d   i   n   g       D   A   s   f       l   i   b   r   a   r   y   '   }   )   ;   }   }   ;   }   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   ,       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   )   ;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

   d   i   v       i   d   =   '   b   e   '       s   t   y   l   e   =   '   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :   n   o   n   e   ;   v   i   s   i   b   i   l   i   t   y   :   h   i   d   d   e   n   ;   '   &gt;   f   o   r   m       n   a   m   e   =   '   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   d   e   t   e   c   t   '   &gt;   i   n   p   u   t       n   a   m   e   =   '   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   '       v   a   l   u   e   =   '   1   '       t   y   p   e   =   '   h   i   d   d   e   n   '   &gt;   /   f   o   r   m   &gt;   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   
   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   d   e   t   e   c   t   ;   b   &amp;&amp;b   .   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   &amp;&amp;(   a   .   u   e   .   b   f   i   n   i   =   b   .   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   .   v   a   l   u   e   )   ;   a   .   u   e   t   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   t   (   "   b   e   "   )   ;   a   .   o   n   L   d   E   n   d   &amp;&amp;(   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r   ?   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   a   .   o   n   L   d   E   n   d   ,   !   1   )   :   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   E   v   e   n   t   &amp;&amp;w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   E   v   e   n   t   (   "   o   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,   a   .   o   n   L   d   E   n   d   )   )   ;   a   .   u   e   h   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   h   (   0   ,   w   i   n   d   o   w   ,   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   a   .   o   n   L   d   ,   1   )   ;   a   .   u   e   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   .   t   a   g   &amp;&amp;(   a   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   .   s   p   l   i   t   ?    d   .   m   a   t   c   h   (   L   )   )   &amp;&amp;(   f   .   f   =   c   [   1   ]   ,   f   .   l   =   c   [   2   ]   )   ;   r   e   t   u   r   n       b   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       B   (   a   ,   e   )   {   t   r   y   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   [   e   ]   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   b   )   {   }   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       C   (   a   ,   e   )   {   i   f   (   a   &amp;&amp;!    h   .   t   i   m   e   o   u   t   =   0   ;   k   =   h   }   e   l   s   e       i   f   (   l   [   G   ]   )   {   v   a   r       n   =   n   e   w       l   [   G   ]   ;   k   =   "   w   i   t   h   C   r   e   d   e   n   t   i   a   l   s   "   i   n       n   ?
